## Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/djdarcy/Prime-Square-Sum.git
cd Prime-Square-Sum
conda create -n prime-square-sum python=3.12
conda activate prime-square-sum
conda install -c conda-forge numpy primesieve
```
